text: Lysimachia minoricensis is a species of plant in the family Primulaceae. It was endemic to the island of Menorca in Spain. Its natural habitat was Mediterranean-type shrubby vegetation. It became extinct within its natural range due to habitat loss and now only survives in cultivation. ==References== minoricensis Category:Endemic flora of Spain Category:Extinct plants Category:Extinct biota of Europe Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Lysimachia minoricensis
